Package org.thinkit.framework.envali.strategy

Class AnnotationContext

java.lang.Object
org.thinkit.framework.envali.strategy.AnnotationContext
public final class AnnotationContext
extends Object
Context class to determine the validation strategy based on the annotation data type.

create an instance of the class using the of(ValidatableEntity, Field, Class) and validate it according to the annotations using the validate() method.

Since:
1.0

    • validate

      public void validate()
      Execute a validation strategy based on the data type of the annotation.
      Throws:
      InvalidValueDetectedException - If the validation process detects an invalid value
      UnsupportedOperationException - When an unexpected operation is detected during the reflection process
